{{ temperatureResult?.name }}
{{ temperatureResult?.main?.temp_max }}°C
-{{ temperatureResult?.main?.temp_min }}°C
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WeatherData } from './models/weather.model'; import { WeatherService } from './service/weather.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private weatherService: WeatherService) {} public cityName?: string; public temperatureValue = 1; public temperatureResult?: WeatherData; ngOnInit(): void { this.weatherService.getWeatherData('Wellington').subscribe((data) => { this.temperatureResult = data; console.log('data check :', data); }); } onSubmit() {} }
